item.title: Aaaand that's a perfect statement
item.description: Hey hey! On today’s show: Billy Ray Cyrus and Elizabeth Hurley want you to know they spent Easter kissing, Robbie Williams wrote an Instagram essay about the stuff celebrities don’t say out loud, Katy Perry’s foray back to Earth has been marred by a feud with a fast food restaurant, everyone is talking about Anne Hathaway at Ralph Lauren’s fashion show, and George Clooney wants you to know he never fights with Amal. This week, Zara recommended When the Going Was Good by Graydon Carter... Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/ASEMS4278037250

item.title: The Influencer Who's Changed Too Much & Liz Hurley's Hard Launch
item.description:
What happens when a person becomes the brand? Influencer Remi Bader is facing backlash for a personal transformation—and her followers aren’t happy they weren’t part of the journey. We unpack the online pushback and ask: does she actually owe anyone an explanation?

Plus, Pope Francis passed away this week. What happens now? We take you inside the mysterious, centuries-old process of choosing the next Pope... Feed: https://www.omnycontent.com/d/playlist/3ea926be-9be7-482a-8ac3-a44f016e43d1/fb1f46f6-b3d6-4068-8ab5-a44f016e5066/7f09e143-5892-47cc-a7e2-a4e4015c8eee/podcast.rss
